value.stringValue: Have the static code analysis violations been resolved/aligned with TA?
Do your Apex Test Classes run successfully with code coverage % as per project standards?
Have you used best practises to build CSS/HTML , Apex Class, Triggers,Test Classes,Objects etc?
Definition of Ready documented and aligned with stakeholders
Definition of Done documented and aligned with stakeholders
Are Naming Conventions / Coding Standards followed for all the components?
No Omni Components in the Branch?
Are Naming Conventions / Coding Standards followed for all the components?
Have you Implemented exception Handling for SFI Components?
Have you considered using a IP Cache block to store frequently accessed, infrequently updated data saves round trips to the database and improves performance?

fields.fieldText: Apex Q1. Have the static code analysis violations been resolved/aligned with TA ?

fields.fieldText: Apex Q2. Do your Apex Test Classes run successfully with code coverage % as per project standards?

fields.name: Q6
fields.fieldText: Apex Q3. Have you used best practises to build CSS/HTML , Apex Class, Triggers,Test Classes,Objects etc?

fields.name: Q7
fields.fieldText: Omni Q1. Have you taken into consideration the Reusablity of existing components like Omniscripts,Data Mappers,Flex Cards,Integration Procedures ?

fields.name: Q10
fields.fieldText: Omni Q4. Have you considered using a IP Cache block to store frequently accessed, infrequently updated data saves round trips to the database and improves performance?
